definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Now people were convinced that Authur was pointed out by Heaven as their king.
sentences.chinese: 這時人們相信亞瑟稱王是天意。

sentences.english: I wait all day just hoping for one more minute with you, but if has meat to be, it will be.
sentences.chinese: 我整日期盼與你多待一分鐘，但天意難違，命該如此。

sentences.english: Something has made that last leaf stay there to show me how wicked I was.
sentences.chinese: 天意讓那片最後的藤葉留在那裏，證明我是多麼壞。

sentences.english: An act of providence had prevented him from having a death on his conscience.
sentences.chinese: 天意阻止了他因良心譴責而自殺。

sentences.english: Well, amiable Corsican, let us suppose it is providence.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，科西嘉先生，我就算這是天意吧。

sentences.english: But divine will did not tell him to massacre his own people.
sentences.chinese: 但天意並沒有讓他屠殺自己的人民。

sentences.english: It seemed like providence that they had survived the plane crash.
sentences.chinese: 他們倖免於空難似乎是天意。

sentences.english: When visible health and Mong Kok, is the love of all things in the world, is not contrary to the contrary of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 可見生旺時，乃天地發生萬物之情，不可違悖天意。

sentences.english: I hoped to study abroad, but fate had decided otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 我本來希望出國留學，但天意弄人難如願。
但憑天意，真教大行其道，和平。

sentences.english: However, this obligation was believed to come from divine commandment or from tradition.
sentences.chinese: 但這種責任被認爲是天意所歸或傳統所定。

definition: in the unseen world of spirits/mysteriously and inexorably
constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
God's plans supersede our own/Man proposes but God disposes
pinyin: ren2 suan4 bu4 ru2 tian1 suan4
